dcterms:creator: M. Jaderberg
K. Simonyan
A. Vedaldi
A. Zisserman
dcterms:description: The Synth90K dataset is a synthetically generated dataset for text recognition, containing 7.2 million training images with a lexicon of 90,000 words, where each word has been rendered into 100 different synthetic images.
dcterms:title: Synth90K

dcterms:creator: A. Gupta
A. Vedaldi
A. Zisserman
dcterms:description: The SynthText dataset contains 800,000 synthetically generated images for text detection and recognition, with roughly 8 million annotated text instances placed in natural scenes. It provides cropped-word images for training.
dcterms:title: SynthText

dcterms:creator: S. M. Lucas
A. Bissacco
B. Shi
D. Karatzas
K. Wang
dcterms:description: The ICDAR03 dataset contains 258 images for training and 251 for testing, with 1,156 word instances available for the text recognition task. It was collected for text detection and recognition.
dcterms:title: ICDAR03

dcterms:creator: D. Karatzas
A. Bissacco
B. Shi
S. M. Lucas
dcterms:description: The ICDAR13 dataset contains most images from the ICDAR03 dataset, totaling 1,095 word images for evaluation. It is used for text recognition tasks.
dcterms:title: ICDAR13

dcterms:creator: D. Karatzas
A. Bissacco
B. Shi
S. M. Lucas
dcterms:description: The ICDAR15 dataset contains 2,077 word images for evaluation, collected from video frames with various real-world interference factors such as occlusions and motion blur.
dcterms:title: ICDAR15

dcterms:creator: K. Wang
S. Belongie
dcterms:description: The SVT dataset contains images taken from Google Street View, featuring low resolution and distortion factors. It includes 647 word images for evaluation.
dcterms:title: SVT

dcterms:creator: T. Quy Phan
K. Wang
S. Belongie
dcterms:description: The SVTP dataset contains 645 word images cropped from Street View, featuring perspective distortions due to camera viewpoint angles.
dcterms:title: SVTP

dcterms:creator: A. Mishra
A. Vedaldi
A. Zisserman
dcterms:description: The IIIT-5K Word dataset contains 3,000 images for evaluation, with word images cropped from scene texts and born-digital images. It provides two lexicons for lexicon inference.
dcterms:title: IIIT-5K Word

dcterms:creator: A. Risnumawan
A. Zisserman
dcterms:description: The CUTE80 dataset mainly contains curved and/or oriented text instances, originally proposed for text detection but later annotated for text recognition. It includes 288 high-resolution word images.
dcterms:title: CUTE80
